home.heroSubtitle: Scopri alloggi e destinazioni pensati per te.

cmp.title: La tua privacy
cmp.desc: Usiamo cookie per funzionalità, misurazione e (se attivi) marketing/affiliazione.

Maldive.desc: Sabbia bianchissima sandbanks, lagune in impossible shades of blue e tiny islands ringed by coral. La sera drift by with the sound of gentle surf e lantern‑lit piers. Between one sandbar e the next, time slows e the horizon feels close enough to touch.
Maldive.bonus: 🎁 Privato sandbank picnic con butler & drone photo session.

La Maddalena (Sardinia).desc: Granite islands floating in emerald water, bays you reach by barca e scents of myrtle e sea pine. Afternoons mean gelato in pastel harbors; evenings, taverns with fregola e Vermentino.
highlights: snorkeling in water as clear as glass
La Maddalena (Sardinia).bonus: 🎁 Skippered day‑boat to three coves + light lunch on board.

Amalfi Coast.desc: Terraced lemon groves, vertical villages e the endless blue of the Tyrrhenian. Walk the Path of the Gods, drift to hidden beaches e end with granita under a pergola of lemons.
Amalfi Coast.bonus: 🎁 Vintage convertible transfer along the coast road (photo stops incluso).

Algarve.desc: Scogliere dorate cliffs carved by the ocean, caves opening onto turquoise coves e fishing villages painted in white e blue. Mornings for surf, afternoons for cataplana e long siestas.
Algarve.bonus: 🎁 Benagil cave tour con swim stop + GoPro footage.

Ibiza.desc: Pine‑scented coves by day, orange‑violet sunsets e nights that shift from boho chiringuitos to iconic clubs. Away from the buzz, olive groves e quiet fincas promise pure reset.
Ibiza.bonus: 🎁 Guestlist entry + tramonto catamaran drink before the club.

Mykonos.desc: Vicoli imbiancati a calce lanes brushed by bougainvillea, windmills e beach clubs where the sea is a shade card from teal to sapphire. Dinners run late with octopus e stories.
Mykonos.bonus: 🎁 Day‑bed upgrade at a beach club + welcome fruit platter.

Santorini.desc: La caldera cliffs ablaze at sunset, white domes e volcanic beaches. Walk the ridge from Fira to Oia, sip Assyrtiko while the Aegean turns copper e violet.
Santorini.bonus: 🎁 Small‑group tramonto catamaran con meal & open bar.

Bali.desc: Risaie terrazzate, incense at dawn e coastlines where surfers trace lines on glass. Temples glow at blue hour e warungs fill with the aroma of lemongrass e sambal.
Bali.bonus: 🎁 Privato driver (8h) to choose two temples + one waterfall.

Phuket.desc: Falesie calcaree rising from milky‑green water, markets loaded with mango e coconut, e long‑tail barcas that stitch hidden lagune together.
Phuket.bonus: 🎁 Long‑tail private stop in a secret lagoon (snacks incluso).

Zanzibar.desc: Vortici di sabbia bianca over ink‑blue reef, dhow sails at dusk e spice farms perfuming the countryside. Stone Town hums with carved doors e taarab melodies.
Zanzibar.bonus: 🎁 Privato dhow tramonto con fresh fruit & photographer.

Dolomiti.desc: Torri rosate limestone towers that catch fire at sunset, meadows with cowbells e rifugi serving polenta e speck. Trails weave beneath spires e moon‑white scree.
Dolomiti.bonus: 🎁 Sunrise photo hike con mountain‑hut breakfast.

Zermatt.desc: Un villaggio of wood chalets at the foot of the Matterhorn, car‑free streets e a network of lifts linking high pastures. La sera are fondue e flicker of firelight.
Zermatt.bonus: 🎁 Sunrise Gornergrat ticket + thermos of hot chocolate.

Chamonix.desc: Mont‑Blanc’s glaciers tumble above cafés e gear shops; cable cars swoop to razor‑edge ridges while paragliders stitch the sky. The valley buzzes with alpine energy.
Chamonix.bonus: 🎁 Priority slot for Aiguille du Midi + hut snack voucher.

St. Moritz.desc: Glittering lakes, larch forests e trails above a chic, sun‑drenched town. In winter the cresta run sings; in summer the Engadin is all gold grass e sapphire lakes.

Cortina d’Ampezzo.desc: Dolomite queen with cinema‑ready passes, chic Corso Italia e lifts to wild terraces. Aperitivi clink while the Tofane turn peach at dusk.
Cortina d’Ampezzo.bonus: 🎁 Aperitivo on a panoramic deck + lift voucher.

Andorra.desc: Tiny Pyrenean country of granite valleys, Romanesque chapels e duty‑free shops. Trails roll over grassy cols where horses graze in the wind.
Andorra.bonus: 🎁 Thermal spa pass + e‑MTB rental hour.

Aspen.desc: Aspens shimmer like coins in fall, ski runs carve the hills in winter e galleries keep the evenings bright. The Maroon Bells frame it all like a postcard.
Aspen.bonus: 🎁 Maroon Bells shuttle + hot cocoa after sunrise.

Banff.desc: Ice‑blue lakes rimmed by peaks, elk by the roadside e hot springs steaming under snow. Days stretch with canoes, ridge walks e boardwalks over turquoise inlets.
Banff.bonus: 🎁 Canoe rental credit on Lake Louise.

El Chaltén (Patagonia).desc: Argentina’s trekking capital: trails leave straight from town towards granite blades of Fitz Roy. Wind whistles, glacial rivers glow milky blue, e nights are crisp e quiet.
El Chaltén (Patagonia).bonus: 🎁 Packed lunch from a local bakery for summit day.

Arashiyama (Kyoto).desc: Forested hills on Kyoto’s western edge: bamboo groves sigh, riverside paths meander e small temples hide in mossy corners. Autumn sets the hills ablaze.
Arashiyama (Kyoto).bonus: 🎁 Privato tea ceremony con view over the gardens.

cmp.desc: Мы используем cookie для функций, измерения и (при включении) маркетинга/партнёрки.

Мальдивы.desc: Powder‑white sandbanks, lagoons in impossible shades of blue and tiny islands ringed by coral. Evenings drift by with the sound of gentle surf and lantern‑lit piers. Between one sandbar and the next, time slows and the horizon feels close enough to touch.
Мальдивы.bonus: 🎁 Private sandbank picnic with butler & drone photo session.

La Maddalena (Sardinia).desc: Granite islands floating in emerald water, bays you reach by лодка and scents of myrtle and sea pine. Afternoons mean gelato in pastel harbors; evenings, taverns with fregola and Vermentino.
highlights: snorkeling in water as clear as glass
La Maddalena (Sardinia).bonus: 🎁 Skippered day‑boat to three coves + light lunch on board.

Amalfi Coast.desc: Terraced lemon groves, vertical villages and the endless blue of the Tyrrhenian. Walk the Path of the Gods, drift to hidden пляжи and end with granita under a pergola of lemons.
Amalfi Coast.bonus: 🎁 Vintage convertible transfer along the coast road (photo stops included).

Algarve.desc: Golden cliffs carved by the ocean, caves opening onto turquoise coves and fishing villages painted in white and blue. Mornings for surf, afternoons for cataplana and long siestas.
Algarve.bonus: 🎁 Benagil cave tour with swim stop + GoPro footage.

Ibiza.desc: Pine‑scented coves by day, orange‑violet закатs and nights that shift from boho chiringuitos to iconic clubs. Away from the buzz, olive groves and quiet fincas promise pure reset.
Ibiza.bonus: 🎁 Guestlist entry + sunset catamaran drink before the club.

Mykonos.desc: Whitewashed lanes brushed by bougainvillea, windmills and beach clubs where the sea is a shade card from teal to sapphire. Dinners run late with octopus and stories.
Mykonos.bonus: 🎁 Day‑bed upgrade at a beach club + welcome fruit platter.

Santorini.desc: Caldera cliffs ablaze at закат, white domes and volcanic пляжи. Walk the ridge from Fira to Oia, sip Assyrtiko while the Aegean turns copper and violet.
Santorini.bonus: 🎁 Small‑group sunset catamaran with meal & open bar.

Bali.desc: Terraced rice fields, incense at dawn and coastlines where surfers trace lines on glass. Temples glow at blue hour and warungs fill with the aroma of lemongrass and sambal.
Bali.bonus: 🎁 Private driver (8h) to choose two temples + one waterfall.

Phuket.desc: Limestone karsts rising from milky‑green water, markets loaded with mango and coconut, and long‑tail лодкаs that stitch hidden lagoons together.
Phuket.bonus: 🎁 Long‑tail private stop in a secret lagoon (snacks included).

Zanzibar.desc: Swirls of white sand over ink‑blue reef, dhow sails at dusk and spice farms perfuming the countryside. Stone Town hums with carved doors and taarab melodies.
Zanzibar.bonus: 🎁 Private dhow sunset with fresh fruit & photographer.

Доломиты.desc: Pink‑tinged limestone towers that catch fire at закат, meadows with cowbells and rifugi serving polenta and speck. Trails weave beneath spires and moon‑white scree.
Доломиты.bonus: 🎁 Sunrise photo hike with mountain‑hut breakfast.

Zermatt.desc: A village of wood chalets at the foot of the Matterhorn, car‑free streets and a network of lifts linking high pastures. Evenings are fondue and flicker of firelight.
Zermatt.bonus: 🎁 Sunrise Gornergrat ticket + thermos of hot chocolate.

Chamonix.desc: Mont‑Blanc’s glaciers tumble above cafés and gear shops; cable cars swoop to razor‑edge ridges while paragliders stitch the sky. The valley buzzes with alpine energy.
Chamonix.bonus: 🎁 Priority slot for Aiguille du Midi + hut snack voucher.

St. Moritz.desc: Glittering lakes, larch forests and trails above a chic, sun‑drenched town. In winter the cresta run sings; in summer the Engadin is all gold grass and sapphire lakes.

Cortina d’Ampezzo.desc: Dolomite queen with cinema‑ready passes, chic Corso Italia and lifts to wild terraces. Aperitivi clink while the Tofane turn peach at dusk.
Cortina d’Ampezzo.bonus: 🎁 Aperitivo on a panoramic deck + lift voucher.

Andorra.desc: Tiny Pyrenean country of granite valleys, Romanesque chapels and duty‑free shops. Trails roll over grassy cols where horses graze in the wind.
Andorra.bonus: 🎁 Thermal spa pass + e‑MTB rental hour.

Aspen.desc: Aspens shimmer like coins in fall, ski runs carve the hills in winter and galleries keep the evenings bright. The Maroon Bells frame it all like a postcard.
Aspen.bonus: 🎁 Maroon Bells shuttle + hot cocoa after sunrise.

Banff.desc: Ice‑blue lakes rimmed by peaks, elk by the roadside and hot springs steaming under snow. Days stretch with canoes, ridge walks and boardwalks over turquoise inlets.
Banff.bonus: 🎁 Canoe rental credit on Lake Louise.

El Chaltén (Patagonia).desc: Argentina’s trekking capital: trails leave straight from town towards granite blades of Fitz Roy. Wind whistles, glacial rivers glow milky blue, and nights are crisp and quiet.
El Chaltén (Patagonia).bonus: 🎁 Packed lunch from a local bakery for summit day.

Arashiyama (Kyoto).desc: Forested hills on Kyoto’s western edge: bamboo groves sigh, riverside paths meander and small temples hide in mossy corners. Autumn sets the hills ablaze.
Arashiyama (Kyoto).bonus: 🎁 Private tea ceremony with view over the gardens.
